dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William W. Cohen
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: A citation network where nodes represent documents and edges are citation links. Node features correspond to word occurrences in the document’s abstract encoded as bag-of-word vectors. The task is to predict a correct label for each document.
dcterms:title: Pubmed
